title: First Peoples Worldwide Program Fund
description: To provide support for the First Peoples Worldwide, a partnership between Faculty at the Law School and the Center for Ethics and Social Responsibility at Leeds School of Business, housed within the Center for Native American and Indigenous Studies.
marketingContent: In honor of Susan White, Trust and Enrollments Director for the Oneida Nation and Co-Chair of the Investors and Indigenous Peoples Working Group, this link was created to support First Peoples Worldwide, which works from a foundation of indigenous values to achieve a sustainable future for all.
